connectionstring.title: connectionstring
connectionstring.name: Connection string
connectionstring.desc: the rtmp connection string to the avchat30 application on your media server

emoticonsurl.title: emoticonsurl
emoticonsurl.name: Emoticons URL
emoticonsurl.desc: path to the XML file containing the emoticons codes and referrence to the emoticons path.

languagefile.title: languagefile
languagefile.name: Language file
languagefile.desc: path to the XML file containing words and phrases to be used in the chat interface, use this setting to quickly toggle between languages

watermarkForOtherPeoplesStreams.title: watermarkForOtherPeoplesStreams
watermarkForOtherPeoplesStreams.name: Watermark for other people streams
watermarkForOtherPeoplesStreams.desc: path to a png, gif or jpeg file to show over other peoples cameras, this feature has been introduced for blocking users from rebroadcasting other peoples stream using screen sharing software. Use this to put your logo over the video streams.

kickUserAfterThisManySeconds.title: kickUserAfterThisManySeconds
kickUserAfterThisManySeconds.name: Kick user after this many seconds
kickUserAfterThisManySeconds.desc: Number of seconds after which to kick the user from the chat, set to 0 to disable

kickUserAfterThisManySecondsURL.title: kickUserAfterThisManySecondsURL
kickUserAfterThisManySecondsURL.name: Kick user after this many seconds URL
kickUserAfterThisManySecondsURL.desc: if not empty, the user will be taken to this url when the above time expires, this url can be a register page or an upsell page on your website. If empty a message will be shown instead , this message can be configured in the language file.

allowEmailsAndUrlsInUsernames.title: allowEmailsAndUrlsInUsernames
allowEmailsAndUrlsInUsernames.name: Allow e-mails and URLs in usernames
allowEmailsAndUrlsInUsernames.desc: If users can login using URL's or emails as the username

inviteLink.title: inviteLink
inviteLink.name: Invite link
inviteLink.desc: path to be shown in the Invite window inside the chat, if left empty (the default), the chat will try to determine the page it sits on automatically
inviteLink.default: empty , which means it will be automatically detected, a process which sometimes fails :(

disconnectButtonEnabled.title: disconnectButtonEnabled
disconnectButtonEnabled.name: Disconnect button enabled
disconnectButtonEnabled.desc: If the disconnect/leave chat button should be shown in the upper right corner

disconnectButtonLink.title: disconnectButtonLink
disconnectButtonLink.name: Disconnect button link
disconnectButtonLink.desc: The user will be taken to this URL when he will press the Leave/Disconnect button in the top right of the chat area. Leaving it empty will make the button disabled if it is visible.

floodControlEnabled.title: floodControlEnabled
floodControlEnabled.name: Flood control enabled
floodControlEnabled.desc: if enabled, after the user sends a message he will have to wait floodControlDelay milliseconds before he can send another message

floodControlDelay.title: floodControlDelay
floodControlDelay.name: Flood control delay
floodControlDelay.desc: if floodControlEnabled=1, after the user sends a message he will have to wait floodControlDelay milliseconds before he can send another message

maxStreams.title: maxStreams
maxStreams.name: Max streams
maxStreams.desc: The maximum number of audio,video or audio+video streams a user can view at once, lower this number to reduce bandwidth usage on your media server

allowVideoStreaming.title: allowVideoStreaming
allowVideoStreaming.name: Allow video streaming
allowVideoStreaming.desc: if set to 0, the user will not be able to broadcast his camera if he has one, only his microphone - if allowAudioStreaming=1

allowAudioStreaming.title: allowAudioStreaming
allowAudioStreaming.name: Allow audio streaming
allowAudioStreaming.desc: if set to 0, the user will not be able to broadcast his mic if he has one, only his webcam (if allowVideoStreaming=1)

allowPrivateStreaming.title: allowPrivateStreaming
allowPrivateStreaming.name: Allow private streaming
allowPrivateStreaming.desc: if set to 0, the user will not be able to set his audio/video stream to private so his audio/video stream will be always public

formattingEnabled.title: formattingEnabled
formattingEnabled.name: Formatting enabled
formattingEnabled.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the bold, italic, underline, color and font buttons are shown. These buttons controll teh formatting of the text chat messages
formattingEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

youTubeVideosEnabled.title: youTubeVideosEnabled
youTubeVideosEnabled.name: YouTube videos enabled
youTubeVideosEnabled.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the YouTube button in the text chat area
youTubeVideosEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

emoteIconsEnabled.title: emoteIconsEnabled
emoteIconsEnabled.name: Emoticons enabled
emoteIconsEnabled.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the Emoteicon button in the text chat area
emoteIconsEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

sendFileToRoomsEnabled.title: sendFileToRoomsEnabled
sendFileToRoomsEnabled.name: Send files to rooms enabled
sendFileToRoomsEnabled.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the SEND FILE TO ROOM button in the text chat area
sendFileToRoomsEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

usersListType.title: usersListType
usersListType.name: Users list type
usersListType.desc: the type of user list to use

allowEmails.title: allowEmails
allowEmails.name: Allow e-mails
allowEmails.desc: if set to 1, emails written in the text chat will become blue mailto: links, if set to 0 they will be censored with ******

allowUrls.title: allowUrls
allowUrls.name: Allow URLs
allowUrls.desc: if set to 1, urls written in the text chat will become blue links, if set to 0 they will be censored with ******

displayRoomOwners.title: displayRoomOwners
displayRoomOwners.name: Display room owners
displayRoomOwners.desc: Should display the room creators/owners be shown in a separate column in the rooms window
displayRoomOwners.examples: 1 to show them, 0 to hide them

showLoginError.title: showLoginError
showLoginError.name: Show login error
showLoginError.desc: when set to 1, as soon as it loads the chat will display an error and 2 buttons, one to register and one to login, the URLS that will be loaded when these buttons will be pressed can be configured below
showLoginError.examples: 1 to show the error, 0 to hide the error

loginPageURL.title: loginPageURL
loginPageURL.name: Login page URL
loginPageURL.desc: when showLoginError=1, a login button shows up, this is the URL that will be loaded by clicking that URL

registerPageURL.title: registerPageURL
registerPageURL.name: Register page URL
registerPageURL.desc: when showLoginError=1, a register button shows up, this is the URL that will be loaded by clicking that URL

regiserandloginPageFrame.title: regiserandloginPageFrame
regiserandloginPageFrame.name: Register and login page frame
regiserandloginPageFrame.desc: in what frame the above 2 urls should be loaded

maxUploadFileSize.title: maxUploadFileSize
maxUploadFileSize.name: Max upload file size
maxUploadFileSize.desc: Maximum size in bytes of the files that can be uploaded to rooms or sent to users, 524288 bytes = 512 Kbytes. If the file is too big the upload process will not be allowed by AVChat.

textChatCharLimit.title: textChatCharLimit
textChatCharLimit.name: Text chat char limit
textChatCharLimit.desc: the maximum number of characters a text message can have (protection against long spam messages and flooding)

buzzButtonEnabled.title: buzzButtonEnabled
buzzButtonEnabled.name: Buzz button enabled
buzzButtonEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the BUZZ button
buzzButtonEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

secondsBetweenBuzzez.title: secondsBetweenBuzzez
secondsBetweenBuzzez.name: Seconds between buzzes
secondsBetweenBuzzez.desc: after using the [BUZZ] button , it will be disabled for a few seconds, use this variable to set the amount of seconds between buzzez

sendFileToUserEnabled.title: sendFileToUserEnabled
sendFileToUserEnabled.name: Send files to user enabled
sendFileToUserEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the SEND FILE button in the side menu for individual users
sendFileToUserEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

pmEnabled.title: pmEnabled
pmEnabled.name: PM enabled
pmEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the PM button in the side menu for individual users.
pmEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

toggleRandomColors.title: toggleRandomColors
toggleRandomColors.name: Toggle random colors
toggleRandomColors.desc: set to 0 if you want all users text color to default to defaultUserColor as opposed to each user getting a random color. As of September 2011 build this applies only to new people entering the chat, this new build remembers your last color option and uses that

disableGenderSelection.title: disableGenderSelection
disableGenderSelection.name: Disable gender selection
disableGenderSelection.desc: if set to 1, gender options from the login screen are hidden and everyone is considered a male, has no effect on admins

joinRoomsEnabled.title: joinRoomsEnabled
joinRoomsEnabled.name: Join rooms enabled
joinRoomsEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the JOIN ROOM button in the ROOMS LIST window
joinRoomsEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

maxRoomsOneCanBeIn.title: maxRoomsOneCanBeIn
maxRoomsOneCanBeIn.name: Max rooms one can be in
maxRoomsOneCanBeIn.desc: the maximum number of rooms a person can be in at any time

createRoomsEnabled.title: createRoomsEnabled
createRoomsEnabled.name: Create rooms enabled
createRoomsEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the CREATE ROOM button in the ROOMS window
createRoomsEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

freeVideoTime.title: freeVideoTime
freeVideoTime.name: Free video time
freeVideoTime.desc: the ammount of time (in seconds) that a user can watch other streams in 1 day. Each "day" starts at midnight(00:00:00) and ends at 23:59:59 the same day, based on the clock of the users computer. Set to -1 to disable. If changed, the countdown on the users computer will reset to the new value when refreshing the chat!

profileUrl.title: profileUrl
profileUrl.name: Profile URL
profileUrl.desc: the (full) URL to the users profile. if the profileKey var below is set to 'siteId' or 'username' the siteId OR username vars will be added to the end of this string. Example: http://www.mysite.com/profile.php?username=naicu. http://mysite.com/viewprofile.php?id=123, etc...

siteId.title: siteId
siteId.name: Site ID
siteId.desc: the id of the logged in user inside the website/cms, this variable WAS used for buildiong the profile URl for the user if the profileKey was set to "siteId".the value is still used in some places tough like the external users list

inviteEnabled.title: inviteEnabled
inviteEnabled.name: Invite enabled
inviteEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the INVITE button in the top bar
inviteEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

roomsListEnabled.title: roomsListEnabled
roomsListEnabled.name: Rooms list enabled
roomsListEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the ROOMS button in the top bar
roomsListEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

dropInRoom.title: dropInRoom
dropInRoom.name: Drop in room
dropInRoom.desc: Use the interface administration window to see what ids each room has, then come back here and paste that id here. If left empty the rooms list window will be shown automatically after login
dropInRoom.examples: any room id shown in the roms panel in the admin area of AVChat (admin.swf)

miccamsettingsurl.title: miccamsettingsurl
miccamsettingsurl.name: Mic/cam setting URL
miccamsettingsurl.desc: relative path to the .xml file containing the audio and video encoding settings. Use it to give some users the ability to send higher quality video than others.

automaticallyReduceBandwidthUsage.title: automaticallyReduceBandwidthUsage
automaticallyReduceBandwidthUsage.name: Automatically reduce bandwidth usage
automaticallyReduceBandwidthUsage.desc: when active a users video and audio data will not be sent to the video server unless someone is watching that user. This way a lot of bandiwdth is saved on the video server.

historyLength.title: historyLength
historyLength.name: History length
historyLength.desc: when joining a room, the last X messages sent in that room are shown, this variable controls how many are shown

autoStartCameras.title: autoStartCameras
autoStartCameras.name: Autostart cameras
autoStartCameras.desc: if set to 1 the user will start to view PUBLIC cams automatically as soon as they are started, admins with the permission to view private streams will also view private streams automatically

autoStartMyCamera.title: autoStartMyCamera
autoStartMyCamera.name: Autostart my camera
autoStartMyCamera.desc: if set to 2, when a user has a webcam, immediatley after joining the first room, his camera will start broadcasting (the mic will start muted if the user has one).if set to 1, when a user has a webcam/microphone, immediatley after joining the first room, his camera/mic will start broadcasting. If set to 0, the user will have to press the 'Start my camera/mic' buttons to start it . This setting also takes into consideration the allowAudioStreaming and allowVideoStreaming variables

autoStartMyCamAndMicOnlyIfIHaveACam.title: autoStartMyCamAndMicOnlyIfIHaveACam
autoStartMyCamAndMicOnlyIfIHaveACam.name: Autostart my cam and mic onlu if I have a cam
autoStartMyCamAndMicOnlyIfIHaveACam.desc: if autoStartMyCamera=1 and autoStartMyCamAndMicOnlyIfIHaveACam=1 you will start broadasting only if you have a webcam (because everyone has sound cards and Flah Player does not detect if you have a mic it detects if you have a sound card), only has effect if autoStartMyCamera=1

usnmaxchars.title: usnmaxchars
usnmaxchars.name: Username max characters
usnmaxchars.desc: the maximum numbers of characters a username can have

usnminchars.title: usnminchars
usnminchars.name: Username min characters
usnminchars.desc: the minimum numbers of characters a username must have, if you provide 0 or a negative value it will default to 1

changegender.title: changegender
changegender.name: Change gender
changegender.desc: allows or denies a user the ability to modify his gender in the log in screen in the chat

changeuser.title: changeuser
changeuser.name: Change user
changeuser.desc: allows or denies a user to edit his nickname in the username input box from the log in screen in the chat

username.title: username
username.name: Username
username.desc: the default username to be used in the username input box from the log in screen in the chat

gender.title: gender
gender.name: Gender
gender.desc: the default gender icon to be selected in the login when entering the chat, the admin icon and hidden option are only available for the administration interface (admin.swf)
gender.examples: , male, female, couple, admin, hidden or any other id from genders.xml. If you leave it empty it will use the 1st gender in genders.xml for user interface and the admin for admin interface

thumbnailUrl.title: thumbnailUrl
thumbnailUrl.name: Default thumbnail URL
thumbnailUrl.desc: relative or absolute path to the avatar of the logged in user, is only used when the usersListType variable is set to 'thumbnail' mode. Jpeg, png and gif files are supported. If possible use 40x30 thumbnails (40 is the width, 30 is the height).

applyLanguageFilter.title: applyLanguageFilter
applyLanguageFilter.name: Apply langauge filter
applyLanguageFilter.desc: if set to 1, all words present in the badwords.xml will be filtered out from the text chat before they are displayed

adminCanDeleteRooms.title: adminCanDeleteRooms
adminCanDeleteRooms.name: Admin can delete rooms
adminCanDeleteRooms.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the DELETE ROOM button in the ROOMS LIST window
adminCanDeleteRooms.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanBan.title: adminCanBan
adminCanBan.name: Admin can ban
adminCanBan.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the BAN button in the user side menu window and the ADD BAN button in the BANS LIST window
adminCanBan.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanRemoveBan.title: adminCanRemoveBan
adminCanRemoveBan.name: Admin can remove ban
adminCanRemoveBan.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the REMOVE BAN button in the BANS LIST window
adminCanRemoveBan.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanKick.title: adminCanKick
adminCanKick.name: Admin can kick
adminCanKick.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the KICK button in the user side menu window
adminCanKick.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

hiddenGenderEnabled.title: hiddenGenderEnabled
hiddenGenderEnabled.name: Hidden gender enabled
hiddenGenderEnabled.desc: if set to 0 the admin will not be able to login as hidden, the hidden option is never shown in the user interface (index.swf) regardless of this setting

showWhoIsTyping.title: showWhoIsTyping
showWhoIsTyping.name: Show who is typing
showWhoIsTyping.desc: if set to 0, the who is typing bar in the text chat area will not be shown anymore

protectAgainstSpammyMessages.title: protectAgainstSpammyMessages
protectAgainstSpammyMessages.name: Protect against spammy messages
protectAgainstSpammyMessages.desc: if set to 1, spammy users will be the only ones seeing the spammy messages. If a user sends the same exact text message 5 times for example, he will be the only one seeing the message in the text chat 5 times, everyone else will see the message only 1 time

adminCanViewPrivateMessages.title: adminCanViewPrivateMessages
adminCanViewPrivateMessages.name: Admin can view private messages
adminCanViewPrivateMessages.desc: can the admin view private PM's exchanged between people?!

adminCanViewPrivateStreamsWithoutPermiss.title: adminCanViewPrivateStreamsWithoutPermission
adminCanViewPrivateStreamsWithoutPermiss.name: Admin can view private streams without permission
adminCanViewPrivateStreamsWithoutPermiss.desc: if set to 1, the admins will not need permission from the broadcaster to view private streams

jlmessages.title: jlmessages
jlmessages.name: Join/leave messages
jlmessages.desc: the default state of the [show join/leave button] in the text chat area
jlmessages.examples: 0 for unselected (messages will NOT be shown),1 for selected

kbmessages.title: kbmessages
kbmessages.name: Kick/ban messages
kbmessages.desc: set to 0 if you do not want the kicked/banned text chat messages to show up in the text chat area

camsArePrivateByDefault.title: camsArePrivateByDefault
camsArePrivateByDefault.name: Cams are private by default
camsArePrivateByDefault.desc: if set to 1, when users start their webcams/mics they will be private by default

showImagesInline.title: showImagesInline
showImagesInline.name: Show images in line
showImagesInline.desc: when someone posts a URL to an image (or uploads an image to a room/user) that image is shown automatically in the chat

adminCanAccessSettings.title: adminCanAccessSettings
adminCanAccessSettings.name: Admin can access settings
adminCanAccessSettings.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the SETTINGS button in the admin area.
adminCanAccessSettings.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

bandwidthChartEnabled.title: bandwidthChartEnabled
bandwidthChartEnabled.name: Bandwidth chart enabled
bandwidthChartEnabled.desc: wheater to show or not the bandwidth chart in the status bar

showTimeStampsInTextChat.title: showTimeStampsInTextChat
showTimeStampsInTextChat.name: Show timestamps in text chat
showTimeStampsInTextChat.desc: wheater to show or not the time of the text chat messages in the text chat

kickURL.title: kickURL
kickURL.name: Kick URL
kickURL.desc: url to take users to when they are kciked out of the chat, if left empty a kick message (You have been kicked!) is shown in the chat
kickURL.examples: any url or empty for no redirection

banURL.title: banURL
banURL.name: Ban URL
banURL.desc: if set to 1, the admins will not need a password to join private rooms
banURL.examples: any url or empty for no redirection

adminCanJoinPrivateRoomsWithoutPermissio.title: adminCanJoinPrivateRoomsWithoutPermission
adminCanJoinPrivateRoomsWithoutPermissio.name: Admin can join private rooms without permissions
adminCanJoinPrivateRoomsWithoutPermissio.desc: if set to 1, the admins will not need a password to join private rooms

adminCanViewIps.title: adminCanViewIps
adminCanViewIps.name: Admin can view IPs
adminCanViewIps.desc: if set to 1, users logged in trough admin.swf will be able to view the IP of users in the user side menu (when clicking on a user) together with a WHOIS link for that ip. If set to 0, ip's of users might still show up in other palces because of settings like $avconfig["autoAddIpToUsername"] which applies to both users and admins, $avconfig["showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat"] and $avconfig["showWhoisBanKickInText"].

imagePreviewAreaWidthAndHeight.title: imagePreviewAreaWidthAndHeight
imagePreviewAreaWidthAndHeight.name: Image preview area width and height
imagePreviewAreaWidthAndHeight.desc: the width and height of the preview area in which uploaded images and image urls are reviewed in the text chat area

adminGenderEnabled.title: adminGenderEnabled
adminGenderEnabled.name: Admin gender enabled
adminGenderEnabled.desc: if set to 0 the admin will not be able to login using the admin icon

adminCanAccessBannPanel.title: adminCanAccessBannPanel
adminCanAccessBannPanel.name: Admin can access ban panel
adminCanAccessBannPanel.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the BANNED IPS button in the admin area at the top right.
adminCanAccessBannPanel.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanViewExtraInfo.title: adminCanViewExtraInfo
adminCanViewExtraInfo.name: Admin can view extra info
adminCanViewExtraInfo.desc: if set to 1 the admin will see for each user its ip, flash player version, connection protocol, who the user is watching, siteId provided by this file, the media server internal id for the user and the FMIS nternal id and cid

adminCanCloseRooms.title: adminCanCloseRooms
adminCanCloseRooms.name: Admin can close rooms
adminCanCloseRooms.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the CLOSE ROOM button in the admin area.
adminCanCloseRooms.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanJoinClosedAndFullRooms.title: adminCanJoinClosedAndFullRooms
adminCanJoinClosedAndFullRooms.name: Admin can join closed and full rooms
adminCanJoinClosedAndFullRooms.desc: if set to 1 be able to join rooms that are closed or full

showYTVideosPreview.title: showYTVideosPreview
showYTVideosPreview.name: Show YouTube videos preview
showYTVideosPreview.desc: controls the default state of the preview images and youtube videos button
showYTVideosPreview.examples: 0 for unselected = previews will not be shown, 1 for selected = previews will be shown

showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat.title: showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat
showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat.name: Show to admins the user IP in text chat
showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat.desc: applies only to users logged in trough admin.swf. If set to 1, in the text chat beside each username it will be the users ip. $avconfig["showWhoisBanKickInText"] also needs to be set to 1 for the ip to show.
showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat.examples: 0 to not show it, 1 to show it

showMemoryUsage.title: showMemoryUsage
showMemoryUsage.name: Show memory usage
showMemoryUsage.desc: if set to 1, in the top left hand side corner a number representing the used RAM memory will show
showMemoryUsage.examples: 0 to not show it, 1 to show it

parseEmoteIcons.title: parseEmoteIcons
parseEmoteIcons.name: Parse emoticons
parseEmoteIcons.examples: 0 to not show them, 1 to show the emote icons in the text chat area

defaultSort.title: defaultSort
defaultSort.name: Default sort
defaultSort.desc: which of the 4 sort options for the users list should be used/selected when starting AVChat 3

userBecomesIdleAfterXSeconds.title: userBecomesIdleAfterXSeconds
userBecomesIdleAfterXSeconds.name: User becomes idle after X seconds
userBecomesIdleAfterXSeconds.desc: if the user does not move the mouse inside the video chat flash area for more than X seconds he becomes idle in the users list, set to 0 to disable the idle status, the value is in seconds
userBecomesIdleAfterXSeconds.examples: 0,15,30,60, any number, the value is in seconds

downForMaintenance.title: downForMaintenance
downForMaintenance.name: Down for maintenance
downForMaintenance.desc: if active at the start it will post an error message

kickAfterIdleTime.title: kickAfterIdleTime
kickAfterIdleTime.name: Kick after idle time
kickAfterIdleTime.desc: the ammount of user idle-time (in seconds) before auto-kick.
kickAfterIdleTime.examples: as example: 3600 - when user idle time reach 3600 (1 hour) user will be auto-kicked on page with message about auto-kick and button [Enter in chat again], 0 - for disabled (user not auto-kick by idle time)

whosTypingPosition.title: whosTypingPosition
whosTypingPosition.name: Who is typing position
whosTypingPosition.desc: if the whosTyping text should be displayed in up position or down position of the text chat area
whosTypingPosition.examples: 0 for up position and 1 for down Position

maleImageUrl.title: maleImageUrl
maleImageUrl.name: Male image URL
maleImageUrl.desc: path to the male icon that will be diplayed if left empty will use the default icon

femaleImageUrl.title: femaleImageUrl
femaleImageUrl.name: Female image URL
femaleImageUrl.desc: path to the female icon that will be diplayed if left empty will use the default icon

coupleImageUrl.title: coupleImageUrl
coupleImageUrl.name: Couple image URL
coupleImageUrl.desc: path to the couple icon that will be diplayed if left empty will use the default icon

adminImageUrl.title: adminImageUrl
adminImageUrl.name: Admin image URL
adminImageUrl.desc: path to the admin icon that will be diplayed if left empty will use the default icon

rightToLeft.title: rightToLeft
rightToLeft.name: Right to left
rightToLeft.desc: set to 1 for proper RTL support (beta)

hideStatusBar.title: hideStatusBar
hideStatusBar.name: Hide status bar
hideStatusBar.desc: hides the top status bar completely - does not apply to admins logged in trough admin.swf
hideStatusBar.examples: 0 show the bar, 1 hide the bar

usersCanSwitchBetweenPrivateAndPublic.title: usersCanSwitchBetweenPrivateAndPublic
usersCanSwitchBetweenPrivateAndPublic.name: Users can switch between private and public
usersCanSwitchBetweenPrivateAndPublic.desc: controls whether or not the user can swicth his cam between public and private
usersCanSwitchBetweenPrivateAndPublic.examples: 0 user can not switch between public and private cam, 1 he can

allowedRooms.title: allowedRooms
allowedRooms.name: Allowed rooms
allowedRooms.desc: controls whether a user can create public ,private or both types of rooms
allowedRooms.examples: 0 for when user can create both public and private rooms, 1 for when users can create only private rooms, 2 if you want users to create only public rooms

adminCanEditRooms.title: adminCanEditRooms
adminCanEditRooms.name: Admin can edit rooms
adminCanEditRooms.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the EDIT ROOM button in the ROOMS LIST window
adminCanEditRooms.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

ipLookupServiceUrl.title: ipLookupServiceUrl
ipLookupServiceUrl.name: IP lookup service URL
ipLookupServiceUrl.desc: the url for the service used to lookup the ip addreses for the clients

autoAddIpToUsername.title: autoAddIpToUsername
autoAddIpToUsername.name: Auto add IP to username
autoAddIpToUsername.desc: if the ip should be added automaticaly to the username in the following places: when logged in as a user trough index.swf: users list, side menu that shows up when clicking a user in the users list, top status bar, text chat area. When logged in as a admin trough admin.swf: users list, side menu that shows up when clicking a user in the users list, top status bar, text chat area. when logged in as a admin trough admin.swf, the appearance of ips in the text chat area is also controleld trough: $avconfig["showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat"] and $avconfig["showWhoisBanKickInText"]
autoAddIpToUsername.examples: 0 the ip will not be added 1 the ip will be added

showWhoisBanKickInText.title: showWhoisBanKickInText
showWhoisBanKickInText.name: Show whois ban kick in text
showWhoisBanKickInText.desc: if admin should see the kick/ban/ip+whois link text inside the text area beside each text message, this variable has HIGHER priority than $avconfig['showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat'] which means that if showWhoisBanKickInText==1 showToAdminsTheUserIpInTextChat is not taken into consideration anymore

historyLengthForAdmin.title: historyLengthForAdmin
historyLengthForAdmin.name: History length for admin
historyLengthForAdmin.desc: when joining a room, the last X messages sent in that room are shown , this variable controls how many are shown if you are admin

adminCanKickOtherAdmins.title: adminCanKickOtherAdmins
adminCanKickOtherAdmins.name: Admin can kick other admins
adminCanKickOtherAdmins.desc: whether or not admins can kick other admins

adminCanBanOtherAdmins.title: adminCanBanOtherAdmins
adminCanBanOtherAdmins.name: Admin can ban other admins
adminCanBanOtherAdmins.desc: whether or not admins can ban other admins

adminCanViewHiddenAdmins.title: adminCanViewHiddenAdmins
adminCanViewHiddenAdmins.name: Admin can view hidden admins
adminCanViewHiddenAdmins.desc: whether or not admins can view hidden admins

showPreviewButton.title: showPreviewButton
showPreviewButton.name: Show preview button
showPreviewButton.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the [PREVIEW] button in the text chat area.
showPreviewButton.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

showJLButton.title: showJLButton
showJLButton.name: Show join/leave button
showJLButton.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the [Show Join/Leave messages] button in the text chat area.
showJLButton.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

profileCountryFlag.title: profileCountryFlag
profileCountryFlag.name: Profile country flag
profileCountryFlag.desc: relative or absolute path to the image representing the country flag for the user. The flag will be shown in the users list. If this var is empty no flag will be displayed in the users list. Example: http://www.mysite.com/flags/brasil.jpg

upgradeUrl.title: upgradeUrl
upgradeUrl.name: Upgrade URL
upgradeUrl.desc: the link to the upgrade page for the site members, the upgrade button is in the top right corner of the user interface, if lieave it empty the upgrade button will not show up. Example: http://www.mysite.com/upgrade_link

showUserSideMenuOnTextArea.title: showUserSideMenuOnTextArea
showUserSideMenuOnTextArea.name: Show user slide menu on text area
showUserSideMenuOnTextArea.desc: if this is enabeled(set to 1) then when clicking on underlined usernames in the text chat area the user side menu will be shown.if it is disabled then clicking on the undeliened usernames will add that username to the input text field

showLast5ImagesThumbs.title: showLast5ImagesThumbs
showLast5ImagesThumbs.name: Show last 5 images thumbs
showLast5ImagesThumbs.desc: if it is enabled(set to 1) it will show on the right side of the text area 5 thumbs containing the last 5 images added in that room

giftsEnabled.title: giftsEnabled
giftsEnabled.name: Gifts enabled
giftsEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the GIFTS button in the side menu for individual users.
giftsEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

giftsUrl.title: giftsUrl
giftsUrl.name: Gifts URL
giftsUrl.desc: if gifts are enabled this is the path loaded in the browser (pop up window) when the button is clicked, DEST_SITEID and SENDR_SITEID will be replaced with th siteId variable passed for those users trough this file (avc_settings.xxx, siteId represents the id of the user in the site). DEST_USERNAME and SENDR_USERNAME will be replaced with the usernames of the destiation and sender persons respectively. when $avconfig["sendGiftThroughJSApi"] is set to 1, this URL is ignored

typingEnabled.title: typingEnabled
typingEnabled.name: Typing enabled
typingEnabled.desc: whether or not the user can type in AVChat, some sites want to block the ability for visitors to type until they register

stylecssurl.title: stylecssurl
stylecssurl.name: style.css URL
stylecssurl.desc: path to the style.css file containign styles for the looks of AVChat
stylecssurl.examples: any relative path to the css file

badnicksxmlurl.title: badnicksxmlurl
badnicksxmlurl.name: Badnicks xml URL
badnicksxmlurl.desc: path to the xml file containing banned nicknames, you can point this to a php file that gets the words from the db and outputs an xml list of banned nick names
badnicksxmlurl.examples: any relative path to the xml source

stopViewerButtonEnabled.title: stopViewerButtonEnabled
stopViewerButtonEnabled.name: Stop viewer button enabled
stopViewerButtonEnabled.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the "Stop him/her from viewing you" button in the side menu for individual users that are looking at you
stopViewerButtonEnabled.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

showIgnorePMsButton.title: showIgnorePMsButton
showIgnorePMsButton.name: Show ignore PMs button
showIgnorePMsButton.desc: configures the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the [IGNORE PM's] button in the text chat area.
showIgnorePMsButton.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

maxUsersInRoomsLimits.title: maxUsersInRoomsLimits
maxUsersInRoomsLimits.name: Max users in rooms limits
maxUsersInRoomsLimits.desc: a string containing the list of limits for max users in a room available when creating a room
maxUsersInRoomsLimits.examples: an array of numbers,-1 means unlimited

adminCanKickFrom1Room.title: adminCanKickFrom1Room
adminCanKickFrom1Room.name: Admin can kick from 1 room
adminCanKickFrom1Room.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the KICK FROM THIS ROOM button in the user side menu window
adminCanKickFrom1Room.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

timeFormat.title: timeFormat
timeFormat.name: Time format
timeFormat.desc: a string describing the format of the absolute time as shown in the chat. You can format the time using the format characters available in Php's date function: http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

setting.columnsInRoomsPanel:
columnsInRoomsPanels Columns in rooms panel string a string taht allows you to configure and edit the columns shown by the rooms list inside the rooms panel
name users private owner created name users private owner created

showVideoFpsInfo.title: showVideoFpsInfo
showVideoFpsInfo.name: Show video FPS info
showVideoFpsInfo.desc: whether or not the fps info should be shown

lineSpacing.title: lineSpacing
lineSpacing.name: Line spacing
lineSpacing.desc: this setting controls the space between the text lines

adminCanSilenceFromRoom.title: adminCanSilenceFromRoom
adminCanSilenceFromRoom.name: Admin can silence from room
adminCanSilenceFromRoom.desc: configures the status (enabled, diabled, hidden) of the "Silence user on this room" button in the user side menu window
adminCanSilenceFromRoom.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

adminCanSilenceOtherAdmins.title: adminCanSilenceOtherAdmins
adminCanSilenceOtherAdmins.name: Admin can silence other admins
adminCanSilenceOtherAdmins.desc: whether or not admins can silence other admins

silenceDuration.title: silenceDuration
silenceDuration.name: Silence duration
silenceDuration.desc: the amount of time in seconds that the user will have to wait after he has been silenced.Durin this period the user will see everything that happens in the room but he will not be able to take any action.

blockBuzzButtonEnabled.title: blockBuzzButtonEnabled
blockBuzzButtonEnabled.name: Block buzz button enabled
blockBuzzButtonEnabled.desc: controls the state of the [block buzz button]
blockBuzzButtonEnabled.examples: 0 for unselected = the buzz sound will not be played, 1 for selected = buzz sounds will be played, 2 for hidden buzz sounds will be played but the button is hidden

showNumberOfCamsAndMics.title: showNumberOfCamsAndMics
showNumberOfCamsAndMics.name: Show number of cams and mics
showNumberOfCamsAndMics.desc: controls if the muber of cams and mics are shown to an admin userslist for each user
showNumberOfCamsAndMics.examples: 0 do not show, 1 to show them

clearAllRoomsScreensButtonShow.title: clearAllRoomsScreensButtonShow
clearAllRoomsScreensButtonShow.name: Clear all rooms screens button show
clearAllRoomsScreensButtonShow.desc: controls the state of the [clear all rooms screens button] that shows up in the admin area of AVChat
clearAllRoomsScreensButtonShow.examples: 0 show disabled, 1 show enabled , 2 do not show it at all

useEchoCancelation.title: useEchoCancelation
useEchoCancelation.name: Use echo cancelation
useEchoCancelation.desc: controls whether to use or not the echo cancellation mechanism from Flash Player when using the SPEEX audio codec. From our experience this mechanism works really bad so we turned it off by default.
useEchoCancelation.examples: 0 do not use echo cancelation, 1 use echo cancelation

dragEnabled.title: dragEnabled
dragEnabled.name: Drag enabled
dragEnabled.desc: controls whether the elements of the interface can be dragged or not(this will not affect the webcams , they are draggable)

rotatingMessageTime.title: rotatingMessageTime
rotatingMessageTime.name: Rotating message time
rotatingMessageTime.desc: the time (in seconds) between the messages that will be inserted into a room
rotatingMessageTime.examples: any number(if set to 0 no message will be inserted)

rotatingMessageUrl.title: rotatingMessageUrl
rotatingMessageUrl.name: Rotating message URL
rotatingMessageUrl.desc: this is the url to the script that will generate the messages to be fed in the text chat. The script should return a text. The script can be anything even a txt file.

showOnlineTime.title: showOnlineTime
showOnlineTime.name: Show online time
showOnlineTime.desc: controls whether to show or not the online time in the upper menu

checkLinkUrl.title: checkLinkUrl
checkLinkUrl.name: Check link URL
checkLinkUrl.desc: when accessing a link first it passes through the script provided below. The original link is sent to the script as a GET parameter with the name "url".
checkLinkUrl.examples: any url or empy string (this will take directly to the original link)

interpretLinks.title: interpretLinks
interpretLinks.name: Interpret links
interpretLinks.desc: whetherver the URLs posted in the text chat should interpreted and transformed into clickable links

adminCanStopStreams.title: adminCanStopStreams
adminCanStopStreams.name: Admin can stop streams
adminCanStopStreams.desc: controls wether an admin can stop an user's video and audio stream or not

pushToTalkEnabled.title: pushToTalkEnabled
pushToTalkEnabled.name: Push To Talk enabled
pushToTalkEnabled.desc: controls whether the push to talk button appears when you disable the audio stream, if enabled when you press this button you will send audio until the button is released

sendGiftThroughJSApi.title: sendGiftThroughJSApi
sendGiftThroughJSApi.name: Send gift through JS API
sendGiftThroughJSApi.desc: When this setting is set to 1 if someone presses the "Send Gift" button in the user's side menu a JS function called "onSendGift" is called and the $avconfig["giftsUrl"] URL set above is sent as a parameter

viewProfileThroughJSApi.title: viewProfileThroughJSApi
viewProfileThroughJSApi.name: View profile through JS API
viewProfileThroughJSApi.desc: when press "Open Profile" in the user's side menu, if this is enabled a JS function called "onViewProfile" is called and the $avconfig[""] URL set above is sent as a parameter

blockingAUserAlsoBlocksAccessToCam.title: blockingAUserAlsoBlocksAccessToCam
blockingAUserAlsoBlocksAccessToCam.name: Blocking a user also blocks access to cam
blockingAUserAlsoBlocksAccessToCam.desc: whether or not blocking a user also blocks his access to your cam or only blocks his text chat messages
blockingAUserAlsoBlocksAccessToCam.examples: 0 does not block access to cam, 1 blocks access to cam as well

userCanSeeWhoIsWatchingHim.title: userCanSeeWhoIsWatchingHim
userCanSeeWhoIsWatchingHim.name: User can see who is watching him
userCanSeeWhoIsWatchingHim.desc: whether or not the user can see who is watching him
userCanSeeWhoIsWatchingHim.examples: 1 for user can see, 0 for user can not see

pushToTalkDefault.title: pushToTalkDefault
pushToTalkDefault.name: Push To Talk default
pushToTalkDefault.desc: whether or not the P2T button shows up by default

userCanSwicthBetweenP2TAndAlwaysOn.title: userCanSwicthBetweenP2TAndAlwaysOn
userCanSwicthBetweenP2TAndAlwaysOn.name: User can switch between P2T and always on
userCanSwicthBetweenP2TAndAlwaysOn.desc: whether or not the user can swicth betweem P2T and Mic Always ON. If set to 0 the checkbox for the mic in the webcam side menu will be disabled.

userCanBlockOtherUsers.title: userCanBlockOtherUsers
userCanBlockOtherUsers.name: User can block other users
userCanBlockOtherUsers.desc: whether or not a user has access to the [Block User] button in the user list
userCanBlockOtherUsers.examples: 0 for visible+disabled, 1 for visible+enabled, 2 for hidden

clearTextChatButtonStatus.title: clearTextChatButtonStatus
clearTextChatButtonStatus.name: Clear text chat button status
clearTextChatButtonStatus.desc: controls whether or not the Clear text Chat Area button from the lower right corner is hidden, visible and enabled, visible and disabled
clearTextChatButtonStatus.examples: 0 for visible+disabled, 1 for visible+enabled, 2 for hidden

hideUsersList.title: hideUsersList
hideUsersList.name: Hide users list
hideUsersList.desc: whether or not to show the users list

hideLeftSide.title: hideLeftSide
hideLeftSide.name: Hide left side
hideLeftSide.desc: whether or not to show the entire left side

defaultStateTextChatSoundButton.title: defaultStateTextChatSoundButton
defaultStateTextChatSoundButton.name: Default state text chat sound button
defaultStateTextChatSoundButton.desc: controls the state of the PLAY SOUNDS button in the text chat area (which controls whether or not the text chat generates any sounds)

defaultUserColor.title: defaultUserColor
defaultUserColor.name: Default user color
defaultUserColor.desc: controls the color that the user has selected by default in the color picker for the text chat area if the random colors feature is disabled ($avconfig["toggleRandomColors"]=0;). If a color has already been chosen by an user (previously) and saved as a cookie in AVChat this value will be ignored and the cookie value will be used

flipTabMenu.title: flipTabMenu
flipTabMenu.name: Flip tab menu
flipTabMenu.desc: controls the position of the tabmenu relative to the text chat area
flipTabMenu.examples: 0 for top position, 1 for bottom position.

userCanSeeNSFWContent.title: userCanSeeNSFWContent
userCanSeeNSFWContent.name: User can see NSFW content
userCanSeeNSFWContent.desc: controls whether or not the user can see NSFW content
userCanSeeNSFWContent.examples: 0 - the user cannot see content at all, 1 - the user has access to the content but the content is hidden until the user clicks on them, 2 - the user has access and the content is not hidden

enableNSFWFeature.title: enableNSFWFeature
enableNSFWFeature.name: Enable NSFW feature
enableNSFWFeature.desc: controls whether or not the NSFW feature is enabled
enableNSFWFeature.examples: 0 - the feature is disabled ( this also automatically assumes that the value for userCanSeeNSFWContent = 2 so that the filter is off ), 1 - the feature is enabled.

userNamePrefix.title: userNamePrefix
userNamePrefix.name: Username prefix
userNamePrefix.desc: sets a default prefix for the username

gendersUrl.title: gendersUrl
gendersUrl.name: Genders URL
gendersUrl.desc: path to the xml file containing custom genders that will be added to the already default ones.
gendersUrl.examples: any relative path to the xml source

showAdminsOnTop.title: showAdminsOnTop
showAdminsOnTop.name: Show admins on top
showAdminsOnTop.desc: controls whether or not the admins are shown on top of the user list

selectedTabInLoginScreen.title: selectedTabInLoginScreen
selectedTabInLoginScreen.name: Selected tab in login screen
selectedTabInLoginScreen.desc: controls the default selected tab in the login screen

enableOtherAccountOptions.title: enableOtherAccountOptions
enableOtherAccountOptions.name: Enable other account options
enableOtherAccountOptions.desc: ccontrols whether or not the other account authentification options (Facebook) are enabled

enableHtmlClientForDesktopBrowser.title: enableHtmlClientForDesktopBrowser
enableHtmlClientForDesktopBrowser.name: Enable HTML client for desktop browser
enableHtmlClientForDesktopBrowser.desc: controls whether or not the HTML 5 client is available from desktop browser

badWordsXmlUrl.title: badWordsXmlUrl
badWordsXmlUrl.name: Badwords XML url
badWordsXmlUrl.desc: path to the xml file containing bad words
badWordsXmlUrl.examples: values: any relative path to the xml source

applyNickNameFilter.title: applyNickNameFilter
applyNickNameFilter.name: Apply nickname filter
applyNickNameFilter.desc: if set to 1, all words present in the badnicks.xml will not be allowed to login with as username.

showUserLevelError.title: showUserLevelError
showUserLevelError.name: Show user level error
showUserLevelError.desc: if set to 1, if the user's level doesn't permit him to access the chat a specifici message will occur.

enableChatHistoryButton.title: enableChatHistoryButton
enableChatHistoryButton.name: Enable Chat History Button
enableChatHistoryButton.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the Chat History button in the text chat area
enableChatHistoryButton.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

enableBlockViewRequestsButton.title: enableBlockViewRequestsButton
enableBlockViewRequestsButton.name: Enable Block View Requests Button
enableBlockViewRequestsButton.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled, hidden) of the Block View Requests button in the text chat area
enableBlockViewRequestsButton.examples: 0 for disabled, 1 for enabled, 2 for hidden

enableOtherAccountOptionsForGuests.title: enableOtherAccountOptionsForGuests
enableOtherAccountOptionsForGuests.name: Enable Other Account Options For Guests
enableOtherAccountOptionsForGuests.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled) of the other account options authentication if the register screen is shown (specific for the integrations).So a guest your has the option of either register in the specific site, or sign in with Facebook.

enableRegisterTab.title: enableRegisterTab
enableRegisterTab.name: Enable register tab
enableRegisterTab.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled) of the Register and Sign-in tab (the second tab)

enableModeratorForRooms.title: enableModeratorForRooms
enableModeratorForRooms.name: Enable moderator for rooms
enableModeratorForRooms.desc: controls the status (enabled, disabled) of the moderator feature (room creator is also it's moderator)

clientUniqueIdentifier.title: clientUniqueIdentifier
clientUniqueIdentifier.name: Client unique identifier
clientUniqueIdentifier.desc: holds the unique identifier for each user. This is a property generated specificaly for each unique user, and differs from user to user. This property is set in avc_settings.php or avc_settings.aspx.cs respectively, after it is imported from this XML. The default value is empty because it's value is set in avc_settings.xxx. So far this id is used for remembering room owners and giving them moderator permissions.
clientUniqueIdentifier.examples: The value can be an IP, a siteID, or any uniquely generated client-id. The value has to be set from avc_settings.php or avc_settings.aspx.cs respectively, by default it is the IP of the user.

enableAudioVideoOnlyMode.title: enableAudioVideoOnlyMode
enableAudioVideoOnlyMode.name: Enable audio video only mode
enableAudioVideoOnlyMode.desc: If set to 1, AVChat will auto-start and only display live-stream (cameras) that are online in a certain room, and will auto-start the user's camera. Also the settings allowAudioStreaming and allowVideoStreaming are both automatically set to 1.

sortRoomListOn.title: sortRoomListOn
sortRoomListOn.name: Sort room list on
sortRoomListOn.desc: This setting controls the default sort order of the rooms list based on the value given. The values presented below are the column names. Some of them are specific to the admin client (e.g. id). The default sort order is ascending, but it can be changed to descending by adding "_D" to the end of the column name. E.g. name_D

enableNewLineForEveryMessage.title: enableNewLineForEveryMessage
enableNewLineForEveryMessage.name: Enable new line for every message
enableNewLineForEveryMessage.desc: This setting controls whether or not each new text message that is sent will be displayed on a new line having (having the time stamp, username and IP if activated) independent of the username that is sending the message or the time it is sent on.

showMobileChatHistory.title: showMobileChatHistory
showMobileChatHistory.name: Show mobile chat history
showMobileChatHistory.desc: This setting only applies to the mobile client. It controls whether or not the chat history of a room is displayed.

setChatHistoryLength.title: setChatHistoryLength
setChatHistoryLength.name: Set chat history length
setChatHistoryLength.desc: This setting controls the MAXIMUM number of messages that will be loaded by the chat history window, with a minimum value of 250 messages. So for example if the room you are in contains a total number of messages of 1000, only the LAST 250 messages will be loaded in the window. !Important note: increasing this value to a large number can cause delays when entering/switching the room if that specific room contains a large number of messages.

enableReportSending.title: enableReportSending
enableReportSending.name: Enable report sending
enableReportSending.desc: This setting controls whether or not a user can report other users.
enableReportSending.examples: 0 for disabled (users cannot report other users), 1 for enabled (users can report other users)

adminCanSeeReports.title: adminCanSeeReports
adminCanSeeReports.name: Admin can see reports
adminCanSeeReports.desc: This setting controls whether or not an admin can view the reports that have been sent.
adminCanSeeReports.examples: 0 for disabled (admin cannot see reports), 1 for enabled (admin can see reports)

moderatorsCanPromote.title: moderatorsCanPromote
moderatorsCanPromote.name: Moderators can promote
moderatorsCanPromote.desc: This setting controls whether or not a moderator is able to promote any other user in the room to room moderator.
moderatorsCanPromote.examples: 0 for disabled (moderator cannot promote), 1 for enabled (moderator can promote)
